metadata.name: CallCenter
metadata.description: Unified customer context and intelligent response suggestions for call center agents.

action.description: The call center action to perform

actions.name: get_customer_context
actions.description: Retrieve comprehensive customer context including history, preferences, and recent interactions

example.output: Customer: John Smith (VIP - 8 years). Last contact: Billing inquiry 3 days ago. Pending: $47.99 credit. Sentiment: Positive.

actions.name: suggest_response
actions.description: Get AI-powered response suggestions based on customer context and issue

example.output: Suggested: 'Hi John, I see you're following up on your billing dispute. Good news - the $47.99 credit has been approved and will appear on your next statement.'

actions.name: lookup_policy
actions.description: Search knowledge base for relevant policies and procedures

example.output: Policy REF-101: Refunds within 30 days require manager approval for amounts over $100. Full refund available for defective products within 90 days.

actions.name: check_billing
actions.description: Check customer billing status and history

example.output: Current balance: $127.45. Last payment: $89.99 on Dec 1. Autopay: Enabled. No overdue amounts.

actions.name: create_case
actions.description: Create a new support case with notes

input.case_notes: Internet connectivity issues in home office

example.output: Case CASE-2024-8721 created. Priority: Medium. Assigned to: Technical Support Team. SLA: 4 hours.

actions.name: get_call_summary
actions.description: Generate AI summary of current call for wrap-up

example.output: Call Summary: Resolved billing inquiry. Applied $47.99 credit. Customer satisfied. Follow-up: None required. Duration: 4:32.

actions.name: escalate_to_supervisor
actions.description: Escalate call to supervisor with context

example.output: Escalation initiated. Supervisor: Sarah Chen (available). Context packet sent. Estimated wait: 2 minutes.

demoConversation.content: Customer John Smith is calling about a billing issue. Pull up his context.

**Customer: John Smith** (VIP - 8 years)

**Recent Activity:**
- Opened billing dispute 3 days ago
- Last call: Spoke with Sarah about upgrade
- Pending: $47.99 credit awaiting approval

**Suggested Response:** "Hi John, I see you're following up on your billing dispute. Good news - the $47.99 credit has been approved..."
He's happy with that. Create a case summary for this call.

**Call Summary Created**

**Case:** CASE-2024-8722
**Customer:** John Smith (CUST-12345)
**Issue:** Billing dispute follow-up
**Resolution:** Confirmed $47.99 credit applied
**Outcome:** Resolved - Customer satisfied
**Duration:** 3:45
**Next Steps:** None required

Case closed and saved to customer record.
